overview: In Milkman which was made in 2005, Cao Fei sorrowfully captures the daily life of the nominal main character who is a milkman. He is sprawled all over his bed during the day and agonizes over the temptation of an online sex chatting show. By capturing the moment the character’s simple life and his stimulating online fantasy meet, the artist shows another side to her world of art in the virtual reality in which she has continuously showed interest.
title: Milkman
